Class FilterSupport

java.lang.Object
  com.isotrol.impe3.hib.query.FilterSupport

public final class FilterSupport
extends Object

Support class for criteria building using filters.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez.

public static org.hibernate.Criteria add(org.hibernate.Criteria c,
                                         String property,
                                         String filter,
                                         com.isotrol.impe3.dto.StringMatchMode mode)
Adds a restriction. The restriction is only added if the filter and the mode are not null.

Parameters:
c - Criteria.
property - Property name.
filter - Filter value.
mode - Match mode.
Returns:
The criteria for method chaining.
